bioAsHtml: David Pilato is Technical Advocate at elasticsearch and French spoken language User Group creator. In his free time, he likes talking about elasticsearch in conferences like Devoxx FR and BE, JUGs, Web5, Agile France, Mix-IT or in companies (Brown Bag Lunches).

bio:
David Pilato is Technical Advocate at elasticsearch and French spoken language User Group creator.
In his free time, he likes talking about elasticsearch in conferences like Devoxx FR and BE, JUGs, Web5, Agile France, Mix-IT or in companies (Brown Bag Lunches).
